general.description: Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily. Never email yourself a file again! Open your account now!
general.help:
This module offers you the way to store your important documents like invoices and orders in a remote dropbox account.
In order to setup the module, you need:

  • Dropbox Application Credentials: Create your Dropbox API Application
  • Set the Invoices destination path
  • Set the Order destination path

In order to send an invoice or order document, you need to click on the Dropbox button in the order admin detail page or on the invoice admin detail page.

field.label: Secret
field.description: Write here your dropbox application secret.

field.label: Authorisation Code
field.description: This field must be populated after the authorisation task.

field.label: Dropbox: Invoices destination path
field.description: Destination path where the invoices files will be saved. Placeholders: {year} {month} {monthname} {quarter} - eg: /documents/{year}/Invoices/{quarter}/{monthname}/

field.label: Dropbox: Orders destination path
field.description: Destination path where the orders files will be saved. Placeholders: {year} {month} {monthname} {quarter} - eg: /documents/{year}/Orders/{quarter}/{monthname}/
